title: Conor Padraic McMahon Marine Scholarship Fund
description: To provide merit-based scholarship support to full-time undergraduate Marines or former Marines who have been honorably discharged at the University of Colorado Boulder. Applicants must have a 3.0 GPA and must have completed 12 semester hours at CU.
marketingContent: To provide merit-based scholarship support to full-time undergraduate Marines or former Marines who have been honorably discharged at the University of Colorado Boulder.
